1. **As a**(role)
2. **I need**(function)
3.**so that** (benefit)
4.
5. ### Details and Assumptions 
6. *[document what you know]
7.
 8. ### Acceptance Criteria 
9.
10. ```gherkin
11 Given [some context]
12When [ certain action is taken]
13 Then[the outcome of action is observed]
14 ```
